FuncDef: The display bgp routing-table statistics best command displays statistics about BGP optimal and best-external routes.
CLIs: display bgp labeled routing-table statistics best

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the routing-table is in the BGP labeled address family.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view statistics about BGP optimal and best-external routes, run display bgp routing-table statistics best.
Precautions
During route flapping, the route statistics may differ from the actual number of routes on the network because some routes are still on the way.
